While my 30th birthday is coming soon, I'm suddenly getting married, very happy  ðŸ’• hihi.

story.title: Our Story
story.short-intro: 4 years, not too long, not too short, it's time for two hearts being able to find each other again...
story.description-1: On that day, we were destined to be colleagues at TSDV (Toshiba); Hueâ€”the girl who blushed with a few satellites around, and Manhâ€”the quiet guy who loved Hue city and also liked taking photos of Hue xD. us. We had been working together on the same floor or talking to each other at breakfasts in the company, Manh was impressed by her personality, by her blushing times xD, but fate had not yet come, so we just became friends and were good colleagues.
story.description-2: After a while, we each resigned from TSDV-the first company to find new challenges and YOLO with our own joys, and we did not have any contact with each other (because Hue was unfriended without any reason so far ) J
story.title-3: We met again and fell in love
story.description-3: Heaven and earth are favorable, spring flowers bloom, Manh made friend requests with Hue again, we talked and shared a lot about the past, two thoughts, two hearts that were unexpectedly in sync, and that's how we started to love each other.
story.description-4: A little surprise, on the occasion of Hue's birthday, we went to the romantic and dear Hue city, with many beautiful scenes and lots of delicious specialties too. As a result, we gained too much weight. (Tip: If you want to gain weight, you should go to Hue City. Then you can not stop eating xD)
story.description-5: During a foodtour trip with a dear sister far away, Manh proposed to Hue on the bank of a stream in the middle of the Madagui mountains.
story.description-6: We are really happy and need each other in this life. Happiness will be complete when there is joy and happiness from everyone we love and vice versa. We are looking forward to everyone coming to celebrate with us  ðŸ’•.

gallery.short-intro-01: "Do what makes you Happy, be with who make you Smile, laugh as much as you Breathe, love as long as you Live"
gallery.title: Vacation of love
gallery.short-intro: Travel through the oceans, run across a thousand roads with you, my love ...
